definitions.definition: To create a rough finish on stone by treating it with a high - temperature blowtorch .
To fly an unpowered aircraft in a thermal (column of rising air).
definitions.label_groups: gliding , often in the present participle

main_definition: ( stone ) To create a rough finish on stone by treating it with a high - temperature blowtorch .
secondary_definitions: ( gliding , often in the present participle ) To fly an unpowered aircraft in a thermal (column of rising air).
